summary: "Thunderbirds" is a British sci-fi TV show created by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson. It used puppetry and model effects to tell stories about International Rescue, a secret organization that saves lives with advanced technology. The main characters are Jeff Tracy, an ex-astronaut, and his five sons who pilot special vehicles called Thunderbirds. The show aired in 1965 and became very popular, leading to movies, radio adaptations, and even a live-action film. It's known for its cool effects and memorable countdown: "5, 4, 3, 2, 1 - Thunderbirds Are Go!"
title: Thunderbirds (TV series)
